jsx.http.rpc.remote
Class Remote

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.http.rpc.HttpRemote
          jsx.http.rpc.XMLHttpRemote
              jsx.http.rpc.remote.Remote
Direct Known Subclasses:
RemoteReflector
public class Remote
extends XMLHttpRemote

A base class for objects that support remote reflect services.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

Constructor Detail

Remote

public Remote(ObjectLike o)

A typical constructor for a Remote object.

Parameters:
o - An initializer for configuration.
Since:
1.0

Remote

public Remote(int tid,
              java.lang.String vid)

A typical constructor for an Remote object.

Parameters:
tid - The type id for the remote object. The legal type ids are:
  • TID_ARRAY
  • TID_CLASS
  • TID_EXCEPTION
  • TID_FIELD
  • TID_METHOD
  • TID_NULL
  • TID_NUMBER
  • TID_OBJECT
  • TID_REFLECTOR
  • TID_STRING
vid - The value id for the remote object.
Since:
1.0

nul

public static final Remote nul()

Returns a remote object for null.

Returns:
A remote object of null.
Since:
1.0

public static final java.lang.String getString(Remote v,
                                               Index<java.lang.String> id)

type

public static final java.lang.String type(int tid)

Gets description for a remote object type.

Parameters:
tid - A type id for remote objects. The legal type ids are:
  • TID_ARRAY
  • TID_CLASS
  • TID_EXCEPTION
  • TID_FIELD
  • TID_METHOD
  • TID_NULL
  • TID_NUMBER
  • TID_OBJECT
  • TID_REFLECTOR
  • TID_STRING
Returns:
A short descriptive name for the type.
Since:
1.0

public static final int get(Remote v,
                            Index<java.lang.Number> id)

Gets an integer value from a number field with an Index from a given Remote object.

Parameters:
v - A given Remote object.
id - An Index for the field.
Returns:
An integer value for the field.
Since:
1.0

assertType

public static final void assertType(Remote v,
                                    int t)

Asserts a Remote object is of a type.

Parameters:
v - A given Remote object.
t - A type id.
Throws:
This - method throws a ReflectException if the types do not match.
Since:
1.0

isObject

public static final boolean isObject(Remote v)

Checks whether a Remote object is a remote object and not just a value.

Parameters:
v - A given Remote object.
Returns:
true if the Remote object is a remote object; false if the Remote object is just a remote value.
Since:
1.0

assertObject

public static final void assertObject(Remote v)

Asserts a Remote object is a remote object and not just a value.

Parameters:
v - A given Remote object.
Throws:
This - method throws a ReflectException if the Remote object is just a remote value and not a remote object.
Since:
1.0

getString

public static final java.lang.String getString(Remote v)

Evaluates a given Remote object as a string value.

Parameters:
v - A given Remote object.
Returns:
A string value of the given Remote object.
Throws:
This - method throws a ReflectException if the Remote object is not a remote value of string.
Since:
1.0
